MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH63 postcode area of Wirral, affecting properties in Willaston Road, Rocklands Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6.30AM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of ongoing investigations and network checks and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10.30AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8.22AM on 4th April 2021.
